nodes.text: Borke Valkanhayn was a criminal trader from the planet Kalab.

Borke Valkanhayn was the partner of Garvan Spasso. But after a piece of trouble, Valkanhayn was forced to flee to Glova where he continued his business with Spasso. Shortly after the Battle of Endor, Garvan Spasso hired a group of smugglers to carry some spices and holotapes to Borke Valkanhayn on Glova. Valkanhayn also ran Borke's Cantina in Drepplin.
